content: pinafores are a classic style of dress that is extremely versatile and easy to wear kelsey is knitted in the round from the top down with a dainty lace skirt and can be worn over trousers shorts or leggings lk magazine now with a step by step video on youtube https //youtu be/i4kk5s9rjf8 for an online version of the pattern head to my website 1 1 https //www rowrowandkades com/blog/kelsey-dress-free-knitting-pattern #lowvision this pattern is available in a low vision format this version is written in all black text the font is 24 point sans serif with no italics all directions are written with no chart needed
